content:
本件保存七年
C2-62- 2429 MEMO
August 3, 2
To : Mr. R. L. Hirshberg, Program Officer, US AID/C From : C. C. Chang, Chief, Second Division Original signed by C. C. Chang
Subject : Excess Equipment Project No. Y-99-AX(99-471)
TPC requested procurement of 5-ton stake truck, semi- trailer, forklift truck, inverters, cable, indicator, crane, boom and block as shown in the attached list. If you concur and they are available, please initiate necessary action for acquisition and shipment to Taiwan.
Pertinent Reports of Excesa Equipment are also attached herewith.
By copy of this memorandum, TPC is advised that request for excess supply has to be made prior to the date shown as ARD in the excess equipment reports and therefore items for which ARD's Have already expired are all deleted from TPC's original List.
Encl. Reports List Cc: (with list) TPC BES 2D

paragraphs.content: To : Mr. R. L. Hirshberg, Program Officer, US AID/C From : C. C. Chang, Chief, Second Division Original signed by C. C. Chang
Subject : Excess Equipment Project No. Y-99-AX(99-471)

TPC requested procurement of 5-ton stake truck, semi- trailer, forklift truck, inverters, cable, indicator, crane, boom and block as shown in the attached list. If you concur and they are available, please initiate necessary action for acquisition and shipment to Taiwan.
Pertinent Reports of Excesa Equipment are also attached herewith.

By copy of this memorandum, TPC is advised that request for excess supply has to be made prior to the date shown as ARD in the excess equipment reports and therefore items for which ARD's Have already expired are all deleted from TPC's original List.
Encl. Reports List Cc: (with list) TPC BES 2D
